DC CODE ยง 38-1806.09

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Termination of federal support. -- The authority under this subchapter to provide assistance to the private, nonprofit corporation or any other entity established pursuant to this subchapter shall terminate on October 1, 1999.
Sense of the Congress relating to continuation of activities. -- It is the sense of the Congress that:
The activities of the private, nonprofit corporation under ยง 38-1806.04 should continue to be carried out after October 1, 1999, with resources made available from the private sector; and
The corporation should provide oversight and coordination for such activities after such date.

chapter.text: District of Columbia School Reform (Public Charter Schools).

heading.catch_text: Termination of federal support; sense of the Congress relating to continuation of activities.
